Class StudentManagementServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.usc.bill.service.StudentManagementServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StudentManagementService

    @Service
public class StudentManagementServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements StudentManagementService
    StudentManagementServiceImpl.java Purpose: an implementation that handles business operations that concerns student profile and courses-related data within the scope of the current requirement
    Version:
    1.0 11/19/2017
    Author:
    WU, Alamri, STROUD

                                                      UserPermissionException,
                                                      UserNotFoundException
        to get student record from student profile that is existed in system datasource
        Specified by:
        getStudentRecord in interface StudentManagementService
        Parameters:
        userId - id of user where student profile exist
        Returns:
        student record asscoiated with given userId
        Throws:
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if there is no student profile associated with user id existed in the system
        UserPermissionException - if the logged-in user has no permission accessing given id of user
        UserNotFoundException - if no user is logged-in

      • loadStudentProfiles

        @Transactional
public void loadStudentProfiles(java.lang.String filename)
                                         throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                                                UserNotFoundException
        to load student profiles from file that is formated as a JSON into the system datasource
        Specified by:
        loadStudentProfiles in interface StudentManagementService
        Parameters:
        filename - name of file where the records of student existed
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the given filename has improper format
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the file associated with a given filename doesn't exist
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the file associated with a given filename couldn't be parsed into JSONArray
        UserNotFoundException - if the id associated with student record is existed in the system for admin user

      • updateStudentProfle

        @Transactional
public void updateStudentProfle(java.lang.String userId,
                                                StudentRecord studentRecord,
                                                boolean permanent)
                                         throws NoStudentProfileFoundException,
                                                UserPermissionException,
                                                UserNotFoundException
        to updated existed student profile with a given record of student
        Specified by:
        updateStudentProfle in interface StudentManagementService
        Parameters:
        userId - id of user where student profile exist
        studentRecord - will be updated to the existing student record
        permanent - to determine whether the changes should be permanent or temporary
        Throws:
        NoStudentProfileFoundException - if there is no student profile associated with user id existed in the system
        UserPermissionException - if the logged-in user has no permission accessing given id of user
        UserNotFoundException - if no user is logged-in
        See Also:
        StudentProfile, StudentRecord
